participant_1.background:
I collect guitar picks and guitar strings to use in my music.
My parents are supportive of my career as a party planner, but they are worried about me being lonely.
i just bought my first car.

participant_2.background:
I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea.
I am a movie buff who has a passion for collecting memorabilia from my favorite films.
I enjoyed the peace and quiet of my cabin on the lake.
I am slightly overweight because I spend too much time watching television and not enough time exercising.
i am interested in producing music.

content.text: That sounds like a fun job! What's your favorite part?
I love getting to meet new people and planning events that make them happy.
That's awesome! I'm a movie buff who loves collecting memorabilia from my favorite films.
That's awesome! I love watching movies too. Do you have a favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption. It's such a classic and the story is so inspiring.
I've never seen it! I'll have to check it out. I'm also a big fan of country music. What are your favorite bands?
I love country music too! My favorite bands are Zac Brown Band, Luke Bryan, and Jason Aldean.
Great choices! I love all of them. I'm also a bit of a music producer myself.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to produce music.
It's not too hard to get started. There are a lot of great resources online.
I'll have to check them out. Thanks for the tip!
